Additional  Commissioner of   Security (CA) , BCAS  in the event of  any  
incident / unlawful interference    at  the  civil airports  in India by  the 
concerned  Airport  Director / Incharge  Airport  Management. 
 
In supersession of this Bureau Circular No. 22/2003 dated 14.7.2003, the 
Airport Director/ In-charge Airport Management of  the  concerned   airport   shall  
ensure to promptly   communicate to Commissioner  of  Security (CA) /  
Additional  Commissioner of  Security  (CA)/  and Joint Secretary  In-charge

interference  at  the airport.
